exceptions.tactic: destruct (sss_dec P st1 st2); [left | right]; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code st1, st2 : state The term "P" has type "code" while it is expected to have type "instr".

original: destruct (sss_dec P st1 st2); [left | right]; auto.
